text: Ara smarana karo! Tomara prabhu adamera bansadharadera theke -- tadera prsthadesa theke -- tadera santana-santati enechilena, ara tadera nijedera sanbandhe tadera saksya di'iyechilena -- ''ami ki tomadera prabhu na'i?’’ Tara balechila -- ''ham, amara saksya dicchi.’’ Ejan'ya ye pache tomara kiyamatera dine balo -- ''amara to e bisaye ajnata chilama,’’
